languages.text: "Флейтист как в воду канул. Скверно, это только подтверждает мои опасения, что с этим музыкантом дело нечисто".
"The flute player has vanished into thin air. Unfortunately, this just confirms my fears that there is something not quite right about him."
languages.original_text: "Флейтист как в воду канул. Скверно, это только подтверждает мои опасения, что с этим музыкантом дело нечисто".

traits.locale_text: "The flute player has vanished into thin air. Unfortunately, this just confirms my fears that there is something not quite right about him."

languages.text: «El flautista se ha desvanecido sin dejar rastro. Por desgracia, esto confirma mi temor de que no tramaba nada bueno».
languages.original_text: "The flute player has vanished into thin air. Unfortunately, this just confirms my fears that there is something not quite right about him."

traits.locale_text: «El flautista se ha desvanecido sin dejar rastro. Por desgracia, esto confirma mi temor de que no tramaba nada bueno».

languages.text: 「フルート奏者は忽然と姿を消した。残念ながら、消えたことで彼に何か不審な点があるのではないかという私の仮説を裏付けてしまいました」
languages.original_text: "The flute player has vanished into thin air. Unfortunately, this just confirms my fears that there is something not quite right about him."

traits.locale_text: 「フルート奏者は忽然と姿を消した。残念ながら、消えたことで彼に何か不審な点があるのではないかという私の仮説を裏付けてしまいました」

languages.text: “那个吹笛人消失得无影无踪。遗憾的是，这证实了我的怀疑，他有些地方不太对劲。”
languages.original_text: "The flute player has vanished into thin air. Unfortunately, this just confirms my fears that there is something not quite right about him."

traits.locale_text: “那个吹笛人消失得无影无踪。遗憾的是，这证实了我的怀疑，他有些地方不太对劲。”

languages.text: "Der Flötenspieler hat sich in Luft aufgelöst. Leider bestätigt das nur meine Sorge, dass etwas an ihm nicht stimmt."
languages.original_text: "The flute player has vanished into thin air. Unfortunately, this just confirms my fears that there is something not quite right about him."

traits.locale_text: "Der Flötenspieler hat sich in Luft aufgelöst. Leider bestätigt das nur meine Sorge, dass etwas an ihm nicht stimmt."

languages.text: « Le joueur de flûte s'est volatilisé. Ce qui ne fait que confirmer mes soupçons : il y a anguille sous roche. »
languages.original_text: "The flute player has vanished into thin air. Unfortunately, this just confirms my fears that there is something not quite right about him."

traits.locale_text: « Le joueur de flûte s'est volatilisé. Ce qui ne fait que confirmer mes soupçons : il y a anguille sous roche. »

languages.original_text: "The flute player has vanished into thin air. Unfortunately, this just confirms my fears that there is something not quite right about him."

languages.text: "Flütçü sırra kadem bastı. Ne yazık ki bu durum, onun bir işler çevirdiğine dair korkularımı destekliyor."
languages.original_text: "The flute player has vanished into thin air. Unfortunately, this just confirms my fears that there is something not quite right about him."
